test_cases.description: Test that main completes successfully when users are returned by UserService, and users are displayed.
test_cases.name: test_main_successful_execution_with_users

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns a non-empty list of user objects.
test_setup.then: Users are fetched, display_users is called with users, no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main completes successfully when UserService returns an empty user list.
test_cases.name: test_main_successful_execution_with_no_users

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns an empty list.
test_setup.then: Users are fetched as an empty list, display_users is called with empty list, no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles exceptions from UserService.fetch_all_users and logs the error.
test_cases.name: test_main_fetch_all_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users raises an Exception('database error').
test_setup.then: No users are returned, display_users is not called, log contains 'Failed to retrieve users: database error'.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles exceptions thrown by display_users and logs the error.
test_cases.name: test_main_display_users_raises_exception

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns users. display_users raises an Exception('display error').
test_setup.then: Users are fetched, display_users is called and raises, log contains 'Failed to retrieve users: display error'.

test_cases.description: Test that main processes and displays users with special characters in their data.
test_cases.name: test_main_users_with_special_characters

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns users with special/unicode characters in names and emails.
test_setup.then: Users with special characters are fetched and passed to display_users, no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles the scenario where the user database is empty (no users exist).
test_cases.name: test_main_empty_database

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns [].
test_setup.then: display_users is called with an empty list, no errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Test that main can handle and display a very large number of users efficiently without errors.
test_cases.name: test_main_large_number_of_users

test_setup.given: Logging is set up. UserService.fetch_all_users returns a very large list (e.g., 10,000 users).
test_setup.then: All users are passed to display_users, no errors are logged, no performance issues occur.

test_cases.description: Test that main behaves appropriately if setup_logging raises an exception.
test_cases.name: test_main_logging_setup_fails

test_setup.given: setup_logging raises an Exception('logging setup failed').
test_setup.then: main terminates with an uncaught exception or logs the setup failure, no further steps are executed.

test_cases.description: Test that main handles exceptions raised during UserService instantiation.
test_cases.name: test_main_userservice_init_fails

test_setup.given: UserService constructor raises an Exception('init error').
test_setup.then: main terminates with an uncaught exception or logs the error, fetch_all_users is not called.
